name: Headquarters Notion Productivity Template
description_html:
Simplify Your Life and Accomplish More with My Second Brain Notion Template - the Ultimate Productivity System

Headquarters is the Personal All-In-One Notion Template designed around the BEST Productivity Methods

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê 5 STARS with 3500+ USERS

"Stop feeling overwhelmed. Headquarters helps you organize your work and life, and stay focused ‚Äî without the setup stress."



Read more testimonials on the side panel ‚û°Ô∏è ‚û°Ô∏è ‚û°Ô∏è

üöÄ Are you struggling with

  • Are you overwhelmed by endless tasks? ü§Ø The Task "Order" tab helps you prioritize with ease so you can reclaim your time.
  • Are you tired of juggling multiple apps? üòü Headquarters puts EVERYTHING in one place so you can focus on what really matters.
  • If Notion feels overwhelming ü´† You‚Äôll get a ready-made setup that‚Äôs easy to use‚Äîno tinkering required.
  • If you struggle with discipline and focus üëÄ The time tracking feature, quick buttons features and project templates will allow you stop getting distracted and start getting stuff done!

üöÄ Headquarters is perfect for you if:

  • You‚Äôre using Notion already and you‚Äôre not seeing any changes in your productivity
  • You don‚Äôt have any productivity system and feel overwhelmed with life‚Äôs tasks
  • You‚Äôre using 5+ different apps and want 1 home with everything organized
  • You‚Äôre been trying to build your own Notion dashboard and now want an all-in-one solution

üå± How to setup Headquarters

  1. Step 1: Download the template (only 1 click)
  2. Step 2: Add your Projects
  3. Step 3: Now start adding your tasks, journaling, time tracking, etc; throughout your day!

ü§î Why Use Headquarters?

  • Simple Frontend, Powerful Backend
  • Tasks, Projects, Life Buckets, Notes, Resources & more in 1 Dashboard (stop wasting time switching between apps)
  • Built around the Top 10 Productivity Methods¬†- so you can spend less time planning and more time achieving your goals
  • Enables you to identify and focus on Projects that will have the BIGGEST Impact
  • 1 Hub Consolidation for Work & Life (where you can zoom in and out of specific projects)
  • Built in Time Tracker (categorised by Project & Life Bucket) to adjust your planning going forward

Simple Frontend, Powerful Backend


Tasks, Projects, Life Buckets, Notes, Resources & more in 1 Dashboard

Your Calendar

Your Tasks

Your Projects

Your Life Buckets

Your Notes & Resources


Built around the Top 10 Productivity Methods¬†

1Ô∏è‚É£ To Do Lists & Calendars¬†

This template is 1 smart system, meaning the to do list and calendar speak to each other

2Ô∏è‚É£ Time Blocking¬†

This feature allows you to organise your day based on priority, and with 1 click you can see all the relevant materials

3Ô∏è‚É£ Eisenhower Matrix¬†

The ‚ÄúOrder‚Äù feature helps you by automatically reshuffling your tasks based on Urgency and Importance to schedule your highest priorities first


4Ô∏è‚É£ Avoiding Context Shifts¬†

With built in Context Switching; daily planning and zoom-in-projects show only the relevant tasks and notes, so you‚Äôll stay on focus to avoid constantly jumping back and forth.

5Ô∏è‚É£ Energy scheduling¬†

The ‚ÄúState of Mind‚Äù feature helps you navigate your week with the best possible workflow for each day, to ensure you have a productive (yet realistic) week


6Ô∏è‚É£ Pareto Principle / The 80 20 Rule

The system lets you review your tasks to discover the outlier 20% of tasks giving the best result

7Ô∏è‚É£ Bottleneck Analysis¬†

This feature helps you to overcome your work and personal problems by giving them actionable tasks

8Ô∏è‚É£ Dynamic Journaling¬†

This feature embeds all your completed tasks directly INTO your journal entry, so you can review your month based on data & see what 'Moves the Needle'


9Ô∏è‚É£ Time Tracking¬†

The Time Tracking page breaks down your completed tasks by Project and Life Bucket to know EXACTLY where your time is going

üîü Eat the Frog¬†

Ensure you tackle the highest priority task first (in each workday)



Headquarters enables you to identify and focus on projects that will have the biggest impact


1 Dashboard Built around the 10 Best Productivity Methods that Changed my Life


Built in Time Tracker (categorised by Project & Bucket) to adjust your planning going forward


What's Included?

‚úÖ The Full Notion Template

‚úÖ Built around the 10 Productivity Methods

‚úÖ Built in Time Tracker System

‚úÖ Dynamic Journaling System

‚úÖ Bonus 50 Daily Journal Prompts

‚úÖ Step by Step Walkthrough Video

‚úÖ Free Access to any future Template Add-Ons

Transform Your Productivity FOREVER and Download Headquarters Today


Why You Shouldn't Wait ‚è±Ô∏è


üëâ "I don't have time to set up a new system"

Exactly, that's why I created Headquarters. Designing the perfect Notion setup takes WEEKS if not MONTHS. With Headquarters you can download and start using a proven productivity formula immediately.

üëâ "I'm already using Notion, why do I need this?"

A lot of people who download Headquarters are already using Notion. Most of the time, they started using Notion but haven't found that smooth and seamless productivity setup just yet. With Notion you can build ANYTHING. The problem with that, is that you can build ANYTHING. And most of the time, it's not an optimal setup. I took MONTHS to build Headquarters, and tried every productivity method under the sun, and only implemented the ones that actually work. Headquarters isn't a bloated template with pointless widgets and clutter; it's made with one thing in mind: true productivity.

üëâ "What if it's too complicated for me?"

That's the best part! Unlike other Notion templates, that are packed with random (and pointless) features to pump up the price. I built this around the productivity methods that actually provided me value. And, I created an easy to follow template walkthrough so you know how it all works. My goal was that if you have a basic understanding of Notion, then you'll understand Headquarters.

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê 5 STARS with 3500+ USERS

I get incredible stories every week from Headquarters users, here are some of my favourites...

Headquarters FAQ

How do I start using it?

After purchase, you will find the link to duplicate the Headquarters Notion Template into your Notion account. You will need a Notion account (free or paid) to duplicate.

Is there a recurring fee for this?

Nope! One time payment for my Headquarters Notion Template!

Is there Customer Support?

We offer minimal post-download support to keep costs low. Our product is competitively priced due to this approach. While we may assist with critical issues, our response times and availability are limited. We recommend watching the full tour to see and understand the template's capabilities before downloading.

Is there a Refund Policy?

We cannot offer refunds for our Notion templates. Once shared, they cannot be returned due to their digital nature. We encourage you to carefully watch the full Notion tour before making your purchase decision. However, if you have watched the full walkthrough Notion tour video and find that the functions of the template do not align with what was demonstrated, we are pleased to offer a 30-day money-back policy to ensure your satisfaction.

Is there a community or group?

No, we do not offer a dedicated community or group for our Notion templates. Our focus is on providing cost-effective, efficient solutions that empower you to work more effectively. By not including a membership, we keep our prices lower, aligning with our mission to help you streamline your work.

Have more specific questions?

If you have any specific questions then please email consultantnotion@gmail.com and I‚Äôll be happy to answer and help out!


Disclaimer

There is no guarantee this template is bug free. I have worked very hard to ensure everything is working properly but if there are any issues, big or small, please email consultantnotion@gmail.com

likewise, if you have any feedback, please email consultantnotion@gmail.com

When downloading any of our products, be aware that we do not guarantee virus-free files and cannot be held responsible for any damages that may result from your use of our Notion templates, digital products, videos, or services. You are solely responsible for protecting yourself and making any decisions based on our products at your own risk. We provide no express or implied warranties for our templates, which are for personal use only, and we do not guarantee any specific results. Any claims, damages, liabilities, or expenses arising from your use of our products are your responsibility, and you agree to indemnify and hold us harmless.

This product is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or connected to Notion Labs, Inc.

‚ÄòSecond Brain‚Äô is used here as a descriptive term for a personal knowledge system. This product is not affiliated with or endorsed by any trademark holder or third party.

name: Ultimate Notion Dashboard | Build Your Own Digital World!
summary: A complete life O.S. Notion template for tracking your tasks, projects, goals, and notes.
description_html:
You can view a walkthrough of this template here. Note that this purchase does not include any additional walkthroughs.

Introducing the Ultimate Notion Dashboard for boosting productivity and organization! This template is designed to help you streamline your tasks, projects, and notes all in one convenient location. With a beautifully minimalist and intuitive layout, you can easily stay on top of your to-do's, set reminders, track progress, and even build your own working knowledge wiki.

This template is founded on the principals of the Pillars Pipelines and Vaults system (PPV) which integrates the best parts of GTD, PARA, and Zettelkasten into an all-encompassing life O.S. dashboard!

Your purchase includes pre-built pages for:

  • Task Management
  • Project Management
  • Calendar and Schedule
  • Notes and Research
  • Reflection and Journaling
  • Goal Setting
  • Content Creation
  • and more!

Don't waste time creating your own template from scratch. Get started on your most productive year yet with this Notion template today!

Disclaimer: Each template purchase is subject to ONE user. Sharing your download link is prohibited. Thank you for your honestly and supporting this project I have worked so hard on!

All purchases for digital downloads are non-refundable or exchangeable.

¬†Note: While much of this system was developed by own tinkering and experimenting, I want to make sure I give credit where due.

Many of the pages in this system were adapted from August Bradley's free templates. While my system is more comprehensive than what he offers for free, I suggest looking at this link first to see if it already has what you need!

Other templates that were adapted from others' work include the Meal Planner, Book Notes, and Book Tracker. You can download these for free. I've included them in my template pack because I've integrated them into my entire system (rather than standalone templates), but I am not claiming to have developed these from scratch.

Organise your Life with the Ultimate Life OS Notion Template

Life OS is an all-in-one system built inside of Notion that has everything you need to stay productive, organised and healthy all in one place. Manage your projects, tasks, resources, notes, finances, contacts, events, habits, and goals and a lot more

FAQs

1. What is Notion?
Notion is a comprehensive and fully-integrated workspace that simplifies note-taking, task management, project planning, and organization. Designed with versatility in mind, Notion offers a user-friendly interface that facilitates productivity and maximizes efficiency. Whether you're a writer or a project manager, Notion is the ultimate workspace to help you get things done.

2. What is Notion template?
Notion templates are ready-made components that can be imported into your Notion workspace to optimize your productivity. These templates are tailored to specific needs, such as project management, task tracking, or note-taking. By utilizing Notion templates, you can streamline your workflow and accelerate your productivity in no time.

Yes

name: Task and Project Management System - Notion Template
description_html:
Manage all your projects and tasks in the most organized and efficient way possible.

Use the Notion Project Management Template to stay focused and implement a robust structure for your business or personal projects.

About the template

This advanced Task and Project Management Notion Template will allow you to use Notion as a real task and project management app.

Whether you need a project management system for you or your business, this template perfectly works for individuals and for teams.

To save you hours of work trying to set up your own system, we built this ready-to-use Project Management Notion Template with clear guidelines and instructions.

The best part of it is that it is built in a way that is 100% customizable to your needs and organization.

üëâ If you need to manage everything from your daily tasks to your large projects, solo or with your team members, this Notion template is for you.



What‚Äôs inside the template?

‚úî 30+ database views to customize your dashboards

‚úî Personal and team dashboards to easily organize your work

‚úî Page templates for every new Task, Project, Topic, and Area

‚úî 4 clean and easy to manage relational databases

‚úî Project management by timeframe, month, quarter, and year

‚úî Today, Tomorrow, This Week focus views

‚úî Detailed onboarding Guide and instructions


Who is this template for?

The Task and Project Management System is perfect for startups and small businesses, as well as independent entrepreneurs and freelancers.

Made to be flexible, this template is also perfect to start using Notion as a task management app for your personal life.


Special features

  • Views: This template uses all the power of Notion views including lists, boards (Kanban), calendars, timelines, and galleries.
  • Dashboards: This template includes a series of prebuilt dashboards to help you easily view and navigate through your general and personal Areas, Topics, Projects, and Tasks.
  • Personal Dashboards: The personal dashboards only show relevant information to the user viewing it. Topics, projects, and tasks are filtered and only shown to Owners or Participants.
  • Progress bars: projects display an automated progress bar based on the percentage of completed tasks related to the project.
  • Page templates: all pages for Areas, Topics, Projects, and Tasks have a dedicated preconfigured template.


How does the template work?

This template operates with 4 main databases:

  • Areas - Areas are domains of your business or high-level categories of your work or life. This template is prefilled with 6 areas that are common internal operations to most businesses. You can easily customize them according to the type of projects you want to use this template for.
  • Topics - Topics are subdomains or categories of your areas. They help you categorize your projects for a clean organization. This template is also prefilled with example topics for each area. You can delete or add topics according to your needs.
  • Projects - Projects are groups of tasks that can be linked to topics or directly to areas. You can give them due dates and optionally add start dates to create timeframes for your projects.
  • Tasks - Tasks are associated with one or many projects. They can also be directly associated with a topic without being part of a specific project.


üëâ It‚Äôs time to get organized and boost your productivity with your new Advanced Task and Project Management System.



F.A.Q.

Does this template work with Notion‚Äôs free plan?

Yes. This template will perfectly work if you are on Notion‚Äôs free plan. There are absolutely no limitations for personal use. You will even be able to use it with a small team as Notion Personal plan allows you to share pages with 5 guests. If you want to use this template with a larger team, we recommend you to switch to a Personal Pro plan or Team plan.

Does this template come with specific documentation?

Yes. This template includes a detailed guide with clear instructions. This will allow you to understand the template‚Äôs structure and easily get started with it.

Can I personalize my template?

Of course! Once you duplicate the template into your Notion workspace, you are free to make any changes you like. You can customize your databases, views, and dashboards to your liking.

Can I share this template?

This Notion template comes with different licenses depending on the plan you chose.¬†The Personal license is for individual use only. The Team license lets you use the template with 5 users. The Company license lets you use the template with as many users as you want. In any case, you are not allowed to share the template with other individuals or organizations.

What will happen after my purchase?

Right after your purchase, you will be redirected to the Notion welcome page of the template. You'll get access to the instructions page and the actual template.¬†You will be able to duplicate everything into your own Notion workspace. You‚Äôll also receive an email with the link to the template and the option to receive an invoice.

About the creators

Hey, we are Valentin and Quentin, Notion Certified and cofounders of the Notion templates marketplace Notion Everything.

Hit us up if you have any questions at contact@notioneverything.com

¬© 2023 NotionEverything. All rights reserved.

name: Notion Ultimate Productivity System
description_html:
Become twice productive and get things done with Notion Ultimate Productivity System.

Notion Ultimate Productivity System will help you complete more tasks, projects, and goals while staying in complete control of your productivity.

It's a complete productivity system for individuals and businesses, right inside Notion. Created to ease the pain from all the outgoing projects and tasks. Based on the GTD method, fueled with a powerful set of features for better task management.

It will be a one-time purchase that helps you take complete control of your productivity Never again feel overwhelmed by never-ending projects and tasks. With this Notion template system, you can regain your focus and do more in less time.

Keep track of the tasks you need to complete. Invite others to collaborate.

Notion Ultimate Productivity System gives you a sharp vision of what you need to do and when. Just write down tasks that you need to complete. Set your own deadlines. When needed, invite others to collaborate.

Manage multiple projects with ease. See what needs to be done in a click.

Write down all your projects. Create timelines. Assign the tasks. Your progress will be automatically tracked. This will let you know where you stand, and will let you plan your days, weeks or months more effectively.

Get better at planning your time. Use Eisenhower Matrix for a better prioritizing.

Get your head lighter and your vision clearer - follow the planning system. Just sit down and write down what you need to do. Utilize the Eisenhower matrix to prioritize your tasks effectively. Then schedule them in your calendar.

Get two different Notion style versions with single purchase free of charge.

You will receive two different versions of Notion Ultimate Finance Tracker. One is minimalistic, black and white. The other one is aesthetic filled with beautiful gradients. You will have the ability to explore and choose the one that suits you best.

What you‚Äôll get:

  • Entire productivity dashboard.
    View projects, tasks, goals from a single dashboard.
  • Task Manager.
    Create and manage tasks. Set deadlines. Invite others.
  • Project Manager.
    Fill out projects. Create timelines, assign tasks.
  • Goals Tracker.
    Make S.M.A.R.T. goals and track progress towards.
  • Planning System.
    Capture, prioritize and schedule tasks upfront.
  • Productivity Tips.
    Learn new ways to become more productive.
  • Extra Resources.
    Get a list of the best productivity resources.
  • And much much more...

Inside you'll find a whole operating system with more than 15 Notion templates that will help you to become more productive and get things done.

FAQs:

1. What is Notion?

Notion is an all-in-one workspace that allows you to take notes, add tasks, manage projects, and get organized. Whether you're writing or planning, Notion has a versatile design for getting things done.

2. What is Notion template?

Notion templates are pre-built Notion components that can be imported into your Notion workspace and are a great way to boost your productivity in Notion.

3. How I will receive a template?

After purchase, you'll receive a link to duplicate the Notion template to your workspace.

4. Will I need to pay to use Notion?

No, Notion does offer a free plan with no strings attached.

5. How can I become an affiliate?

Click here to fill out the affiliate form.

6. I have more questions.

Send your question at modest@notionway.com. I will be more than happy to answer.


¬© 2022 Notionway. All rights reserved.

name: 2025 Dream Life Planner ‚ô° Simple & Aesthetic Notion Template
description_html:
A simple, feel-good system for moving toward your dreams ‚òÅÔ∏è

Meet your new digital homebase for planning, organizing, and documenting your life ‚Äî that prioritizes feeling good while you use it. Featuring a softer approach to goals and easy-to-personalize planning pages, this Notion template is designed to make intentional living a pleasurable and sustainable endeavor.

Put simply: We want things cute, flexible, infinitely inspiring, and easy as cake to use.

This Notion system is the perfect blend of simple, functional, and aesthetic. With just a few key databases that take advantage of the app's best features, the point of this Notion setup is ultimately to keep your planning process easy and effortless. No unnecessary bells and whistles, no cluttered dashboards that are overwhelming to look at, no overcomplicated rows of databases that just leave you confused ‚Äî only the essentials and the delights.

Suitable for beginners and advanced Notion users alike, this is the Notion template for people who want a beautiful, intuitive planning system that's easy to use and maintain over time.

„Ä∞Ô∏è

Designed for:

  • Goal setting, action mapping & progress tracking
  • Yearly, monthly & weekly planning
  • Simple daily to-do lists
  • Mood tracking, journaling & memory collection
  • Holistic, all-in-one life organization & management


What's included:

  • üó∫Ô∏è A detailed year planning page for 2025 goal setting as well as quarterly & monthly goal mapping
  • ü¶ã 2 built-in goal systems you can easily switch between whenever you feel like it: the structured approach and the intuitive approach (a.k.a. the dream menu system)
  • üìí 12 unique monthly planner layouts, plus 4 blank DIY templates for you to easily customize your own
  • üìù Intentionally simple weekly planning spreads and daily to-do lists that are effortless to use & reset
  • üåø Detailed experience tracking system for mood tracking & memory archiving, designed for making reflecting into a seamless routine and discovering insightful patterns about your emotions & behavior
  • ‚úçÔ∏è Focused journaling dashboard for getting your feelings out & getting grounded, including guided morning journaling and blank page options
  • üìì A simple system for collecting & organizing notes about all areas of your life
  • ‚òÅÔ∏è A clean, minimal life dashboard homepage designed to keep the most important pages top of mind
  • üíê Bonus lifestyle extras such as package tracker, conscious shopping tracker, dopamine menu (aka joy menu or resourcing page), meeting notes, and more

(This purchase grants access to the Notion template for one single user. It may not be shared, sold, copied, or distributed in any form.)

„Ä∞Ô∏è

Note: The experience tracker database setup is inspired by Wesley Anna's review cycles system in her Ultimate Notion Dashboard. The Dream Life Planner's experience tracker focuses on mood tracking & memory collection, while Wesley's reviews tackle goal progress, habits & improvements. Check to see what's a good fit for you!

„Ä∞Ô∏è

Have questions about buying or using this template? Shoot me an email at slowcozykelly@gmail.com üíå

Thanks for being here, friend üíï

name: Notion Content System
description_html:
Limited-Time Offer: Get 30% OFF with code CONTENT2025!

Streamline your content creation process with the Content System Notion template.

Feeling overwhelmed and disorganized by content creation?

Introducing the Content System, a comprehensive solution built within Notion to manage your entire creator business. Whether you're crafting exceptional content for yourself or clients, defining your content roadmap, bookmarking resources, tracking goals and growth, or managing affiliates, this system has you covered. With a one-time purchase, you'll revolutionize your content management like never before.

Completely streamline your content creation process.

Optimize your content creation from start to finish. Capture your ideas, transform them into structured drafts, and integrate them into your content calendar. Once scheduled, your content is ready for timely publication, ensuring you stay organized, consistent, and ahead of your goals.

Create a content roadmap for optimal content strategy.

For better content optimization, start by defining a clear content roadmap. Identify your target audience, choose the platforms that align with your goals‚Äîlike Instagram, X, or your newsletter‚Äîand establish a consistent weekly content plan to guide your creation and publishing.

Manage content for multiple clients and sponsors.

Create, schedule, and track content for all your clients and sponsors from dedicated dashboards. Manage planning, publishing, and performance in one organized space. Stay on top of payments and client activity with ease.

Track your goals and witness your daily growth.

Boost your motivation by setting clear goals and tracking your progress along the way. Measure your growth to stay inspired and focused. Try different content strategies to see what drives the most engagement.

Access a full analytics dashboard to track your business performance.

Access a powerful analytics dashboard that gives you a clear overview of your performance. Track essential metrics such as monthly client revenue, sponsorship and affiliate earnings, total content published, and more. Monitor your content creation efforts in real time and gain the insights you need to make confident and data-driven decisions.

These charts will only be displayed if you have a Notion PAID plan.

Choose what fits you best between light and dark mode.

The Content System is optimized to be compatible with both light and dark mode. Choose the style that fits you best.

What's included?

  • Complete content creation process dashboard.
  • Roadmap ‚Äì Define your audience, choose your platforms, and set up a weekly content plan to guide your strategy.
  • Content ‚Äì Create, manage, and schedule all your content from a single place.
  • Topic ‚Äì Build and organize your content around well-structured topics.
  • Template ‚Äì Design reusable templates to speed up your creation process.
  • Bookmark ‚Äì Save inspiring content and use it to craft even better, more impactful pieces.
  • Contact ‚Äì Store and manage the details of people you meet or collaborate with during your content journey.
  • Goal ‚Äì Set clear goals and track your progress to stay motivated.
  • Growth ‚Äì Monitor your daily growth and gain insights.
  • Client ‚Äì Create, manage, and schedule content for your clients, while keeping track of their payments.
  • Affiliate ‚Äì Keep track of all your affiliate links and the payouts they generate.
  • Sponsorship ‚Äì Manage your sponsorships and craft optimized content tailored to each partner.
  • Tool & Resource ‚Äì Save and organize the tools and resources that support your content creation process.
  • Bonus: Free guide with videos to help you master the template.
  • Bonus (PAID Plan): Full analytics dashboard to track business performance.
  • And much more...

What do people think about it?

Discover how this system has changed the lives of those who have purchased it.

I can help you even more...

If you're seeking a life-changing experience with Notion, I have just what you need. Gain exclusive access to a bundle that includes all of the premium and free templates I've created for Notion, at a $519 discount from the original price.

Notion Optimal Bundle

FAQs:

1. What is Notion?

Notion is a single workspace where you can think, write, and plan. Capture thoughts, manage projects, or even run an entire company ‚Äî and do it exactly the way you want.

2. What is Notion template?

Notion templates are pre-built Notion pages that can be imported into your Notion workspace and help you to gain productivity and organisation.

3. Is Notion a paid software?

Notion does offer a free plan. However, access to the charts view requires a paid plan.

4. How I will receive the template?

After purchase, you'll receive a link to duplicate the Notion template to your Notion workspace.

5. Is there any refund policy?

Due to the nature of digital products like Notion templates, I do not offer any refunds or exchanges.

6. Can I become an affiliate?

Sure you can! Click here to fill out the affiliate form.

7. Still have questions?

Ask me anything at hello@eazypath.com. I will try my best to fulfill your request.

refund_policy.title: No refunds allowed
refund_policy.fine_print:
Thank you for choosing our products. This No-Refund Policy governs the purchase and use of our digital products. By purchasing or accessing our Digital Products, you acknowledge and agree to the terms outlined in this policy.

Nature of Digital Products:
Our digital products are delivered electronically and are non-physical, intangible items. All sales are deemed final once the Digital Products are delivered or accessed; they cannot be canceled, exchanged, or returned.

No Refunds:
Due to the nature of Digital Products, we do not provide refunds or accept returns for any reason, including but not limited to:
a) Change of mind or personal preferences.
b) Software, operating system, or device incompatibility.
b) Insufficient knowledge or expertise to utilize the digital products efficiently.
d) Dissatisfaction with the Digital Products' features, functions, or overall performance.
e) The discontinuation, alteration, or unavailability of any related services or Digital Products.

Product Descriptions and Pre-Purchase Evaluation:
We strive to offer precise and comprehensive descriptions of our digital products so that you can make well-informed judgments about what to buy. Before making a purchase, it is your obligation to check the product details, requirements, specs, and compatibility. If you require explanations or have any issues, please email our customer service staff at contact@chrisnotion.com.

Technical Support:
We work hard to offer dependable and prompt technical support to help you with any problems or questions pertaining to our digital products. However, depending on the particular product, your membership, or your purchase, the availability and scope of technical help may change. Technical support does not promise exchange, refund, or problem solving.

Modification of Policy:
We reserve the right to modify or amend this No-Refund Policy at any time.

As a small design studio or freelance branding and graphic designer, you're constantly seeking ways to streamline your processes, get organized, and achieve your goals. That's where the Design Studio Suite comes in - the complete solution to help you run your studio with ease.

Get your copy of Design Studio Suite today and get organized, streamline processes, and run your studio with confidence!

Made with love,

name: Publish OS: Notion Content Creator Template
description_html:
Manage all your Content Creation in 1 Dashboard

Gain Subscribers with a PROVEN System that you can implement IMMEDIATELY

to ensure you get the views that YOU DESERVE


Introducing; Publish OS

Idea Generation

Quickly capture ideas and label their Channel and Content Pillar

Content Planning

Strategically plan your content across all channels & stay consistent with uploads.

Streamlined Process

With the "Stage" board view, sponsor deadline count-down, dynamic calendar and the "in the works" hub; you can ensure you always stay on top of the content that you're working on.

üëâ Organise your Content Creation in 1 System: Publish OS

‚úî Content Calendar

‚úî Automatic Content Idea Ranking System (AutoRank)

‚úî Keyword Score Feature

‚úî Content Pillars & Channels

‚úî Content Process Board

‚úî Analytics Panel (by Pillar, CTA and Clicks)

‚úî Feedback Collection Depot

‚úî Content Inspiration Hub

‚úî Sponsor Center (Revenue, Leads, Stages)

‚úî Affiliate Dashboard

‚úî Call to Action Console

‚úî Team Tasks & Individual Dashboards

‚úî Networking Console

‚úî Tools Tracker

‚úî Quick Access Asset Library

Okay, Let‚Äôs Break Down the Key Features in Publish OS....


üëâ Gain Insights on your Top-Performing Content¬†

Analytics

Track CTA Clicks & the View Results to find trends in best performing content by Channel, by Pillar and by CTA.


Experiments

Run experiments with your content and track the results to know how to keep iterating and improving your content


üëâ Automatically rank ideas based on Predictive Content Success

AutoRank

Use Data to strategically grow your channels, by estimating the success of the content before creating it.¬† ‚ÄúAutoRank‚Äù automatically organises your ideas based on search volume, competition levels and timeliness so you know what content to prioritise first.


Keyword Score

Automatically orders your Keywords based on search volume and difficulty to rank first, so you know where to focus your efforts


Audience Feedback

Quickly capture Audience Feedback & Content Ideas


üëâ Create a sustainable posting schedule

Content Calendar

Visually plan out your content calendar with a strategy. Growth comes from a great plan.¬†


Create Reliable Content Pillars

Develop clear Content Pillars to make content brainstorming easier, and content pieces that your audience looks forward to.

üëâ Monetise with a Plan

Sponsored Content

Handle your sponsorship leads, sponsored content, sponsor earnings and sponsor deadlines (with auto-countdowns).


Call to Actions

Track Call to Action responses per video and see the average & total clicks by Content Pillar, by CTA and by Channel.


Affiliates

Track your Affiliates and their codes in the one dashboard


üëâ Other Valuable Features


üë§ Outsource & Support

With a built-in ‚ÄúTeam‚Äù page you can easily outsource work when your Content Creator business is ready to take the next step.


üì∑ Tracking your Subscriptions & Gear

As a Content Creator we have so much to juggle, don‚Äôt fill your head with the clutter of organising your subscriptions and gear.


üñºÔ∏è Quick links to your Asset Library

Easily find your assets in a split second to make the content creation process even faster.


üëâ The Building Blocks behind Publish OS

The CREATE Process is the backbone of my Notion system, designed to optimize every aspect of your content creation journey.

Here's how it works:

  • Concept: Pick Winning Content Ideas
  • Ranking: Choose Ideas Likely to Perform Well
  • Earning: Monetize your Creativity
  • Assemble: Streamline your Production Pipeline
  • Timing: Post at the optimal time for your audience¬†
  • Examine: Dive into your data and experiments


üö´ Stop wasting hours EVERY week without a system üö´

Sticky notes, notes in the phone, scripts in Google Docs‚Ä¶ make sure it‚Äôs all in the past.

With a system you can

  • Be Consistent with Uploads
  • Post Content that will perform well
  • Build accounts that people look forward to each and every upload


Without a system, you‚Äôll waste months or even years without a clear plan.

Don‚Äôt struggle because you don‚Äôt have a system to focus on what you love‚Äîcreating content.


This system helps you pick winning ideas based on strategy, not luck.

You‚Äôll find video ideas that rank easily, get views, and avoid competing with top channels.

It took me a year of waiting for the algorithm before realizing I needed a system to find my winning content ideas.


Getting started can feel like an uphill battle, full of effort and resistance.

But with a system in place, that hill flattens out.

Over time, your momentum builds, turning that once-steep climb into a smooth ride where your content keeps gaining speed.

And this is the system that can get you there.




Publish OS FAQ

How do I start using it?

After purchase, you will find the link to duplicate the Publish OS Notion Template into your Notion account. You will need a Notion account (free or paid) to duplicate.

Is there a recurring fee for this?

Nope! One time payment for my Publish OS Notion Template!

Is there Customer Support?

We offer minimal post-download support to keep costs low. Our product is competitively priced due to this approach. While we may assist with critical issues, our response times and availability are limited. We recommend watching the full tour to see and understand the template's capabilities before downloading.

Is there a Refund Policy?

We cannot offer refunds for our Notion templates. Once shared, they cannot be returned due to their digital nature. We encourage you to carefully watch the full Notion tour before making your purchase decision. However, if you have watched the full walkthrough Notion tour video and find that the functions of the template do not align with what was demonstrated, we are pleased to offer a 30-day money-back policy to ensure your satisfaction.

Is there a community or group?

No, we do not offer a dedicated community or group for our Notion templates. Our focus is on providing cost-effective, efficient solutions that empower you to work more effectively. By not including a membership, we keep our prices lower, aligning with our mission to help you streamline your work.

Have more specific questions?

If you have any specific questions then please email consultantnotion@gmail.com and I‚Äôll be happy to answer and help out!



Disclaimer

There is no guarantee this template is bug free. I have worked very hard to ensure everything is working properly but if there are any issues, big or small, please email consultantnotion@gmail.com

likewise, if you have any feedback, please email consultantnotion@gmail.com

When downloading any of our products, be aware that we do not guarantee virus-free files and cannot be held responsible for any damages that may result from your use of our Notion templates, digital products, videos, or services. You are solely responsible for protecting yourself and making any decisions based on our products at your own risk. We provide no express or implied warranties for our templates, which are for personal use only, and we do not guarantee any specific results. Any claims, damages, liabilities, or expenses arising from your use of our products are your responsibility, and you agree to indemnify and hold us harmless.

name: RIA Reading System - Notion Template
description_html:
Turn the Wisdom of Books into Action.

RIA provides convenient tools for every reader and knowledge manager to easily record, categorize, and review essential content.

Whether for daily learning or in-depth research, RIA helps you transform knowledge into actionable insights, enhancing your personal growth and cognitive abilities.

Features

  1. Quotes: Capture key passages and notes from your books, allowing you to save meaningful quotes for later reference and deeper reflection.
  2. Library: Organize and manage your book collection, categorize them by genre, read status, or personal preference to make navigation easier.
  3. Action: Turn your knowledge into actionable steps by setting practical goals, creating tasks, and tracking your progress from learning to execution.
  4. Topic: Organize books and notes by specific themes or subjects, making it easier to dive deeper into related content and connections.
  5. Author: Manage and categorize books by author, keeping track of works by your favorite writers and discovering new ones.

Frequently Asked Questions

  1. What is Notion?

    Notion is a free-to-use single digital space where you can think, write, and plan. Capture thoughts, manage projects, or even run an entire company ‚Äî and do it exactly the way you want. This template is built inside Notion and is easy to use and set up even with no prior knowledge.
  2. What is a Notion Template?

    Notion templates are pre-built Notion components that can be imported into your Notion workspace, so you avoid spending long hours building systems and workspaces from the ground up.
  3. Do I need to be on a paid Notion plan to use this?

    Not at all. You can use all the features of this template without a paid Notion plan.
  4. Can I make changes to this template?

    Of course. Templates are meant to be customized to your own needs, so after duplicating you can and should edit it as much as you like.
  5. Is my payment information secure?

    Yes, Gumroad is a well established marketplace that‚Äôs been in business for over 10 years. They use Stripe and PayPal as their payment processors, so your payment information is 100% secure.
  6. What if I have other questions?

    You can send us an email at kristenindiedev@gmail.com and we‚Äôd be happy to answer.
